greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0; for n > 1, a(n) = A000265(A289271(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A289271(n) = { my(v=0,i=0,x=1); for(d=2,oo,if(n==1, return(v)); if(1==gcd(x,d)&&1==omega(d), if(!(n%d)&&1==gcd(d,n/d), v += 2^i; n /= d; x *= d); i++)); }; \\ After _Rémy Sigrist_'s program for A289271.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 02 2019
